entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
